roleset.name: plant again
roleset.note: REPLANT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from replant.01-v)

example.name: transitive, arg0 and arg2
example.text: Uncle Randolph and Joel had replanted the bottom lands with difficulty , formore of the slaves , including Annie , had sneaked off when the soldiers brokecamp [*T*-1] .
